roleset.name: favorable and contributing towards

example.name: both args
example.text: On the other hand the local governments complain that a stagnating consumption for housing is not conducive for a balanced economical development and so instruct against emergency breaks and support policies to keep steady and healthy development of the housing market .

roleset.note: CONDUCIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from conducive.01-j)
